description: Variation of Conditions 1 (approved plans), 6 (detailed drawings) and 23 (car parking) of planning permission dated 2 November 2018 (RN: 17/06049) for demolition and redevelopment to the podium/ car park structure and redevelopment of site in a building comprising ground and five upper floors to provide 60 residential units (Use Class C3), including terraces and balconies, a communal garden space and 54 car parking spaces with altered entrance from Hall Place. Provision of 101 sqm of retail space fronting onto Edgware Road (Use Class A1/A2/A3). Replacement boundary treatment works and planting on Edgware Road, including replacement of trees and works to the raised bund in front of Parsons House. Re-location of existing recycling centre.  NAMELY that external plant, ductwork and shafts are integrated within the roof area; increase height of building due to thicker floor plates; increase wall thickness to include non-combustible materials; alterations to fa√ßade materials; alterations to elevations including alterations to windows and entrances; additional louvered acoustic panel enclosure for condenser units at fourth floor level; addition of emergency generator at ground floor level; change one 1 bed 2 person unit to a 1 bed 1 person unit; plant reconfiguration within the basement area leading to a loss of 10 parking spaces; change from allocated to allocated parking; and relocate smoke shaft.
decision_conditions: Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
